posts.name: Lara Fernando
posts.cooked:
Hello Everyone!

Team 971, Spartan Robotics, is pleased to announce our fifth annual Spartan Series, an event where we give workshops related to all things robotics! We are planning on hosting an in person event this year, on October 30th. We will also post each workshop on YouTube at www.youtube.com/c/smanrobotics .

The Spartan Series is intended for people of all skill levels and teams of all experience levels. Come learn about mechanical design, software, leadership, and more! If there is something you would like to learn, come! If there is someone you want to meet, come! The Series will be a great event to learn, network, and push your limits.

If you are interested in attending, please fill out this form: https://forms.gle/WP9QAQTzGLm5Wq3m7 .

Feel free to reply to this thread with any comments or questions.

We hope to see you there!

posts.name: Leo
posts.cooked: Will there be Halloween candy there?

posts.name: s-neff
posts.cooked: Will any of the workshops be streamed live, or only recordings posted afterward?

posts.name: Zachary
posts.cooked: Can I bring treats (loctite, 10-32 nuts, etc) for the robot? Or is feeding the robot frowned upon?

posts.name: Téa
posts.cooked: gotta check if the robot is allergic to nuts first!

posts.name: Lara Fernando
posts.cooked: We are planning on taking recordings and posting them afterwards, if there is a specific presentation you would like to get live-streamed, let me know and I can look into it.
